SELECT
    OrderDate,
	DimProduct.ProductPK,
	DimCustomers.CustomerPK,
	DimStores.StorePK,
	CASE
		WHEN DimSalesStaff.SalesStaffPK IS NULL THEN
			9999
		ELSE 
			DimSalesStaff.SalesStaffPK
		END AS SalesStaffPK,
    StoreSales,
    UnitSales,
	SalesOrdersFactStaging.SalesPersonCode
into #OrdersFactTmp
from ext.SalesOrdersFactStaging
left join DimProduct on SalesOrdersFactStaging.ProductCode = DimProduct.ProductCode
left join DimCustomers on SalesOrdersFactStaging.CustomerAccountCode = DimCustomers.AccountNumber
left join DimStores on SalesOrdersFactStaging.StoreCode = DimStores.Code
left join DimSalesStaff on SalesOrdersFactStaging.SalesPersonCode = DimSalesStaff.StaffCode;


insert into [DimSalesStaff] (
      [StaffCode]
      ,[StaffName]
      ,[DepartmentID]
      ,[InsertedDate]
      ,[UpdatedDate]
      ,[ActiveFlag])
select
	distinct SalesOrdersFactStaging.SalesPersonCode,
	'Unknown',
	0,
	getdate(), null, 1
from #OrdersFactTmp 
inner join ext.SalesOrdersFactStaging on #OrdersFactTmp.SalesPersonCode = SalesOrdersFactStaging.SalesPersonCode
where SalesStaffPK = 9999;

update #OrdersFactTmp 
	set SalesStaffPK = DimSalesStaff.SalesStaffPK
from #OrdersFactTmp 
inner join DimSalesStaff on DimSalesStaff.StaffCode = #OrdersFactTmp.SalesPersonCode
where #OrdersFactTmp.SalesStaffPK = 9999;


MERGE SalesOrdersFact AS Target
USING (
	SELECT ProductPK, CustomerPK, StorePK, SalesStaffPK, StoreSales, OrderDate
	FROM #OrdersFactTmp
	GROUP BY ProductPK, CustomerPK, StorePK, SalesStaffPK, StoreSales, OrderDate
) AS Source
ON Target.ProductFK = Source.ProductPK AND 
	Target.CustomerAccountFK = Source.CustomerPK AND
	Target.StoreFK = Source.StorePK AND
	Target.SalesPersonFK = Source.SalesStaffPK AND
	Target.OrderDate = Source.OrderDate
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY Target THEN 
  INSERT(ProductFK, CustomerAccountFK, StoreFK, SalesPersonFK, StoreSales, OrderDate) 
  VALUES(Source.ProductPK, 
            Source.CustomerPK, 
            Source.StorePK,
            Source.SalesStaffPK,
            Source.StoreSales,
            Source.OrderDate
          ) 
WHEN MATCHED THEN  
	UPDATE SET Target.StoreSales = Source.StoreSales;

DROP TABLE #OrdersFactTmp
